spec_data.Name: php-mysqlnd
spec_data.Description:
The php-mysqlnd package contains a dynamic shared object that will add
MySQL database support to PHP. MySQL is an object-relational database
management system. PHP is an HTML-embeddable scripting language. If
you need MySQL support for PHP applications, you will need to install
this package and the php package.

This package use the MySQL Native Driver
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 22 Nov 2017 03:10:21 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A module for PHP applications that use MySQL databases
